name: The Third Little Pig
description:
Inspired by the story of the Three Little Pigs, our game follows the third pig on the journey to building a safe house.

Help our little pig to build a house safe from the threats of the big evil wolf!
During the day, walk around the field to grab whatever materials you can find, and using those materials start covering up your walls!
The evil wolf comes around at night for a hearty pork-chop dinner, so make sure you enclose yourself in the walls as soon as possible.
If any of your wall isn't covered when the night comes, the wolf will find a way to grab the poor third pig for dinner!
To win, cover your house with ONLY red brick walls, and FULLY repair the walls, essentially finishing your house with brick walls just like the third pig in the Three Little Pigs!
